text: 'president trump said hopes make fast decision replacement fired fbi director james comey hinting announcement could come within days mr trump told reporters air force one may select comeys successor leaving first foreign trip next week make fast decision mr trump said outstanding people well known highest level make fast decision president trump speaks members media aboard air force one departure andrews air force base md sat may ap made comments flight lynchburg virginia delivered first commencement address president graduates liberty university think process going go quickly almost well known mr trump said theyve vetted lifetime essentially well known highly respected really talented people want fbi asked pick would announced trip overseas mr trump said even possible unclear whether mr trump referring permanent replacement interim director interim director require confirmation senate could give administration time search permanent pick acting director andrew mccabe charge bureau since comeys precipitous ouster tuesday mr trump travel saudi arabia end next week followed visits vatican israel also travel sicily g meeting brussels summit nato leaders department justice officials spent day saturday interviewing candidates permanent fbi director role including mccabe republican sen john cornyn texas attorney alice fisher federal judge henry hudson former homeland security adviser fran townsend also cbs news national security analyst late day mike rogers former congressman last minute addition list interviewees rogers endorsed permanent director role earlier saturday fbi agents association represents current former agents doj also says several current fbi intelligence officials interviewed interim position including special agent charge adam lee returned doj second interview saturday earlier week doj officials said close naming interim director yet cbs news paula reid kathryn watson contributed report '
